author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-UDG Healthcare Says ‍Profit Before Tax For Quarter To Dec 31 Well Ahead Of Same Quarter Last Year
text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - UDG Healthcare Plc:
* UDG HEALTHCARE - ‍PROFIT BEFORE TAX FOR QUARTER TO 31 DECEMBER 2017 WELL AHEAD OF SAME QUARTER LAST YEAR, AIDED BY RECENT ACQUISITIONS​
* ‍Q1 SHARP‘S OPERATING PROFIT WAS BEHIND SAME QUARTER LAST YEAR​
* ‍PERFORMANCE OF SHARP US IS EXPECTED TO IMPROVE DURING SECOND HALF OF 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
